description: goyacc: fix the panic during error recovery if $$Debug >= 2 and the generated code could not convert the token name correctly. Add the output of the rule listing in y.output to use with Russ's bisonerrors.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: adg@golang.org, golang-dev@googlegroups.com, gri@golang.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/go
leaving for rsc; not sure about the bisonerrors stuff

Russ wrote bisonerrors, an awk script that resides in cmd/gc/, to generate
error messages by example of state stack. Beside that, it's nice to let
goyacc output the numbered list of grammar rules in y.output so I don't
need to count the rules' number when reading y.output. To use the generated
error message, another interface is added as not to break the current Lexer
interface.

- ren

On Tue, Jan 10, 2012 at 2:52 AM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> leaving for rsc; not sure about the bisonerrors stuff
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5532045/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5532045/>
>

subject: code review 5532045: goyacc: fix the panic during error recovery if $$Debug ...
